document.full_text: a red-hot corey perry scored his second successive game-winning goal to help the anaheim ducks beat the calgary flames 5-4 in overtime sunday, a victory which lifted the ducks into playoff position.
document.title: perry strikes again as ducks douse flames in ot
lines_and_colors: a red-hot corey perry scored his second successive game-winning goal to help the anaheim ducks beat the calgary flames 5-4 in overtime sunday, a victory which lifted the ducks into playoff position.
